amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds for being used to implement or enforce the threatened species listing of the Preble's meadow jumping mouse under the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A093) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A093) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
